content:
If triangles are larger than this--that is, more loosely packed--then we
figure a triangle strip is likely to do a more effective job than a
triangle fan, and the fan maker leaves it alone. egg-max-vertices int 65534 Specifies the maximum number of vertices that will be added to any
one GeomVertexData by the egg loader. egg-mesh bool 1 Set this true to convert triangles and higher-order polygons into
triangle strips and triangle fans when an egg file is loaded or
converted to bam. Set this false just to triangulate everything into
independent triangles. egg-min-tfan-tris int 4 The minimum number of triangles that must be involved in order to
generate a triangle fan. Fewer than this is just interrupting a triangle
strip. egg-normal-scale double 1.0 egg-object-type-barrier string <Collide> { Polyset descend } (from Confauto.prc);
